meanings.definition: A device used in the oil industry to extract petroleum from underground wells.
meanings.sent1: The pumpjack moved up and down, pulling oil from deep underground.
meanings.sent2: The workers checked the pumpjack daily to ensure oil extraction continued smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The pumpjack decided it was tired of pumping oil and went on strike!
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the pumpjack stood tall like a diligent worker extracting liquid gold.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic sound of the pumpjack echoed across the oil field.

meanings.definition: To operate a pumpjack to extract oil.
meanings.sent1: He learned how to pumpjack efficiently to bring up the oil.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, they pumpjack to keep the oil flowing.
meanings.sent3: The pumpjack accidentally started dancing while extracting oil!
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like a pumpjack tirelessly working to extract oil.
meanings.sent5: The workers pumpjack with precision to maximize oil production.

meanings.definition: The pumpjack was used to extract oil from the well.
meanings.sent1: Oil gushed out of the pumpjack, filling the barrels with black gold.
meanings.sent2: The pumpjack's constant motion indicated successful oil extraction.
meanings.sent3: The pumpjack threw a surprise party for the workers after a long day of extracting oil!
meanings.sent4: In the quiet night, the pumpjack's silhouette against the stars symbolized prosperity.
meanings.sent5: The pumpjack's metallic frame gleamed under the sun as it worked tirelessly to extract oil.
